result.arabic_text: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
result.translation: Hao ni askari watao shindwa miongoni mwa makundi yatayo shindwa.
result.footnotes: Hao ni askari wanyonge walio shindwa, hapana hivi wala hivi, kama walivyo shindwa mfano kama wao walio jikusanya kuwapinga Manabii.
